item.title: CVE-2024-20038|2024-03-04T02:43:54.898Z -- MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6739, MT6761, MT6765, MT6768, MT6779, MT6781, MT6785, MT6789, MT6833, MT6835, MT6853, MT6855, MT6873, MT6877, MT6879, MT6883, MT6885, MT6886, MT6889, MT6893, MT6895, MT6897, MT6983, MT6985, MT6989, MT8168, MT8188, MT8195, MT8673, MT8675
item.description: In pq, there is a possible out of bounds read due to an incorrect bounds check. This could lead to local information disclosure with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS08495932; Issue ID: ALPS08495932.

item.title: CVE-2024-20037|2024-03-04T02:43:53.317Z -- MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6739, MT6761, MT6765, MT6768, MT6779, MT6781, MT6785, MT6789, MT6833, MT6835, MT6853, MT6855, MT6873, MT6877, MT6879, MT6883, MT6885, MT6886, MT6889, MT6893, MT6895, MT6897, MT6983, MT6985, MT6989, MT8168, MT8188, MT8195, MT8673, MT8675
item.description: In pq, there is a possible write-what-where condition due to an incorrect bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS08495937; Issue ID: ALPS08495937.
